misc

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.Language

  • public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a miscellaneous class that is used to manage the different languages of the application.

    This class manages all the languages and their dialogues. It loads the different available languages from the file *%LANGUAGES_FILE_NAME%*. Then it loads all the dialogues stored in the different language files.

    Version:
    v0.1 03/26/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
